fields.Recipes:
1. Peel plantains.
2. If using spices, mix together with oil and rub on plantain.
3. Grill on an open flame or in an over until golden brown, flipping occasionally.

fields.ingredients: Indomie Relish Chicken, Water, Pepper(Optional) , Carrots(Optional), Eggs
Rice, Tomatoes/Tomato Paste, Oil, Salt, Curry, Thime, Pepper, Beef
Croaker Fish, Pepper, Spring Onions, Seasoning, Garlic, Ginger, Salt, Oil
Pepper Soup Mix, Water, Pepper, Groundnut Oil, Seasoning, Cat Fish
3 cups all purpose flour, Oil for frying, 1/2 teaspoon Salt, 1/2 cup Sugar, 1 tablespoon yeast
fields.Recipes:
1. bloom yeast in 1/2 cup of lukewarm water and a tablespoon of sugar.
2. Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl.
3. Add yeast mixture to dry ingredient and stir in warm water until a smooth and lightly thick batter is formed (not a watery batter).
4. Leave to rest covered in a warm place until doubled in size.
5. Fry in hot oil until golden brown.

fields.ingredients: Indomie Relish Fish, Water, Pepper(Optional) , Carrots(Optional), Eggs

fields.Recipes:
1. Wash rice
2. Boil Rice
3. Boil Chicken

fields.ingredients: Eggs, Baby spinach, Red onion, Sardines, Sweet peppers, Salt
11/4 cup all purpose flour, 2 Eggs, 1 cup/200ml of Milk, 2 Tablespoons melted butter,2 Tablespoons Sugar (Optional), 2 teaspoon baking powder
fields.Recipes:
1. Sift dry ingredients into a bowl
2. In a separate bowl, combine milk, melted butter, vanilla and eggs
3. Add dry ingredients to wet and stir until combined (Do not over mix)
4. Leave to rest for a few minutes then fry in a lightly greased pan.
5. Serve hot with syrup and eggs or any topping of your choice.
